jam.util
Class NumberUtilities

java.lang.Object
  jam.util.NumberUtilities
public class NumberUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Contains utilities for manipulating Numbers Converts native types to array of bytes and array of bytes to native types.

Version:
0.5
Author:
Ken Swartz
See Also:
Double, Float
